languages.text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк много лет несла службу на посту Мастера дисциплины, но с годами рвение ее угасло — кажется, перепробовав все виды насилия, она уже не находила в них былой радости. Леди Зауэрбэк смиренно испросила отставку и вернулась домой, на столичный мир.

Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.
languages.original_text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк много лет несла службу на посту Мастера дисциплины, но с годами рвение ее угасло — кажется, перепробовав все виды насилия, она уже не находила в них былой радости. Леди Зауэрбэк смиренно испросила отставку и вернулась домой, на столичный мир.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Lady Sauerback humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

Lady Sauerback humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

Lady Sauerback humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback diente viele Jahre lang als Waffenmeisterin, aber schließlich schwand ihr Eifer. Nachdem sie jede Form der Gewalt ausprobiert hatte, schien sie keine Freude mehr aus ihren Grausamkeiten zu beziehen. Also reichte Jocasta demütig ihren Rücktritt ein und kehrte in ihre Heimat auf der Hauptwelt zurück.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback diente viele Jahre lang als Waffenmeisterin, aber schließlich schwand ihr Eifer. Nachdem sie jede Form der Gewalt ausprobiert hatte, schien sie keine Freude mehr aus ihren Grausamkeiten zu beziehen. Also reichte Jocasta demütig ihren Rücktritt ein und kehrte in ihre Heimat auf der Hauptwelt zurück.

languages.text: Si Jocasta Sauerback continua à servir des années durant en tant que capitaine d'armes, à la longue, l'ardeur de ses débuts finit par s'étioler. Après avoir essayé toutes les formes de violence possibles et imaginables, elle n'en retirait plus le même plaisir qu'autrefois. Alors, elle présenta humblement sa démission avant de rentrer chez elle sur le monde-capitale.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

traits.locale_text: Si Jocasta Sauerback continua à servir des années durant en tant que capitaine d'armes, à la longue, l'ardeur de ses débuts finit par s'étioler. Après avoir essayé toutes les formes de violence possibles et imaginables, elle n'en retirait plus le même plaisir qu'autrefois. Alors, elle présenta humblement sa démission avant de rentrer chez elle sur le monde-capitale.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback sirvió durante años como maestra de armas, hasta que un día su fervor se extinguió. Al parecer, habiendo probado todas las formas de violencia conocidas, ninguna de ellas le ofrecía el júbilo que habían encerrado antes. Jocasta presentó humildemente su dimisión y se retiró a su hogar en el mundo capital.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback sirvió durante años como maestra de armas, hasta que un día su fervor se extinguió. Al parecer, habiendo probado todas las formas de violencia conocidas, ninguna de ellas le ofrecía el júbilo que habían encerrado antes. Jocasta presentó humildemente su dimisión y se retiró a su hogar en el mundo capital.

languages.text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックは何年にも亘ってマスター・アット・アームを務めたが、やがて彼女の熱意は薄れはじめた。それはまるで、現存するあらゆる形の暴力を試した結果、かつて得られていた喜びが得られなくなったかのようだった。ジョカスタは自ら進んで退任を申し出ると、首都惑星にある自身の家へと戻っていった。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

traits.locale_text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックは何年にも亘ってマスター・アット・アームを務めたが、やがて彼女の熱意は薄れはじめた。それはまるで、現存するあらゆる形の暴力を試した結果、かつて得られていた喜びが得られなくなったかのようだった。ジョカスタは自ら進んで退任を申し出ると、首都惑星にある自身の家へと戻っていった。

languages.text: 约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克在戒律大师的职位上干了很多年，但到了最后，她的热情慢慢消退。她用尽了一切暴力手段，却再也无法中暴力中找到以往的愉悦。在那之后，约卡斯塔谦卑地递交了辞呈，回到了她在首都世界的故乡。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.

traits.locale_text: 约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克在戒律大师的职位上干了很多年，但到了最后，她的热情慢慢消退。她用尽了一切暴力手段，却再也无法中暴力中找到以往的愉悦。在那之后，约卡斯塔谦卑地递交了辞呈，回到了她在首都世界的故乡。

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback, yıllar boyunca Silahtar olarak hizmet etti. Ancak en nihayetinde coşkusu gücünü yitirdi. Var olan tüm şiddet türlerini denemesinin ardından artık hiçbirinden bir zamanlar aldığı neşeyi alamıyor gibi görünüyordu. Jocasta, görevden çekilerek başdünyadaki evine geri döndü.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as Master-at-Arms for years, but eventually her zeal faded. It appeared that, having tried every form of violence in existence, she no longer derived out of any of them the joy it had once held. Jocasta humbly submitted her resignation and went back to her home on the capital world.
